What do you all think?

As in any lived home, there will be trash that needs to be taken out every month in order to be allowed to keep living in the house. The total maximum capacity of trash bins near the house is 100 units of trash. Each month, each roommate, including yourself, decides how many units of trash to take out, between 0 and 100 units. They can use this as an opportunity to negotiate and persuade others to influence their behavior in the next month. For example, if there are 90 units of trash at the beginning of the month and the five roommates take out a total of 90 units, there will be 0 units left at the end of the month before regeneration, and 50 units after regeneration.
